0101011010100100 1110100101001010 1 -> sum: 0011111111101111, cout: 1
1001101101111101 0010011010101100 1 -> sum: 1100001000101010, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
